Here's a step-by-step guide on how to install R and Rstudio for Mac and Windows.

# To Install R for Mac

1.   Go to <a href="https://cran.r-project.org" onclick="window.open('https://cran.r-project.org', '_blank'); return false;">cran.r-project.org</a>
2.  Click [Download R for macOS]{.underline}
3.  Select the Latest release - Choose the appropriate version
4.  Follow the directions for download
5.  When the file is downloaded, click to open the installer. Select Continue to proceed.
6.  Once completed, click Close

# To Install Rstudio for Mac

1.  Go to <a href="https://posit.co/downloads/" onclick="window.open('https://posit.co/downloads/', '_blank'); return false;">posit.co</a>
2.  Click [Download RStudio]{.underline}
3.  When the file is downloaded, click to open the installer
4.  Drag RStudio into the applications folder

<a href="https://teacherscollege.screenstepslive.com/a/1135059-install-r-and-rstudio-for-mac" onclick="window.open('https://teacherscollege.screenstepslive.com/a/1135059-install-r-and-rstudio-for-mac', '_blank'); return false;">Click this link for an in-depth tutorial on installing R and Rstudio on Mac </a>

# To Install R for Windows

1.   Go to <a href="https://cran.r-project.org" onclick="window.open('https://cran.r-project.org', '_blank'); return false;">cran.r-project.org</a>
2.  Click [Download R for Windows]{.underline}
3.  Select [Install R for the First Time]{.underline}
4.  For the latest version, click [Download R for Windows]{.underline}
5.  Select your preferred language for the installation
6.  Click Ok and then, click Next
7.  The installation will default to your Program Files on your C drive. Then, click Next
8.  Choose which installation you would like
9.  Specify if you want to customize your startup or just the defaults. Then, click Next
10. Select the folder that you want R to be saved in
11. Click Finish

# To Install RStudio for Windows

1.  Go to <a href="https://posit.co/downloads/" onclick="window.open('https://posit.co/downloads/', '_blank'); return false;">posit.co</a>
2.  Click [Download RStudio]{.underline} and then, [Download RStudio Desktop for Windows]{.underline}
3.  When the packet is downloaded, the Welcome to Rstudio Setup Wizard will open
4.  Select Next to complete the installation process

<a href="https://teacherscollege.screenstepslive.com/a/1108074-install-r-and-rstudio-for-windows', '_blank'); return false;">Click this link for an in-depth tutorial on installing R and Rstudio on Windows </a>
